lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, you get your coin purse of 2,448.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Great, wonderful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you owe--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, she's paying for that.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: She's got 20 gold.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She had other gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bought a nice meal for you the other night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. She bought a couple of nice meals for you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, shit! That's right. I'll pay you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I lost 100 gold.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What was it? 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2,448 was the number.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I guess I broke even.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You still netted a profit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to take the 500 from that, (mutters quietly) minus 500... 1,948.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That fight was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was fantastic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to say, as you guys celebrate with a joyous drink of ale here at the Bellows' Respite Inn to celebrate the victory of not Philip, but Grog the Victorious in the Cauldron here in the Braving Grounds of Vasselheim in the northwestern region of the countryside, we will go and take a quick restroom break, return here in about five minutes. See you guys here shortly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, guys. Welcome back! We are returning as the party has finished their celebration, drinking hard through the afternoon, celebrating Grog's victory at the Crucible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was that amazing, or was that amazing? I've never seen anything like that, at all! Cheers to you, big man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, bud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: L'chaim!

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Cheers!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I raise my glass of water and cheers, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Tiberius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Y'all enjoy our applesauce.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or glass of water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apple juice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good apple juice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very good apple juice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be gentle with that. Apples don't grow on trees.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This episode of Critical Role brought to you by Mott's!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you wish to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (stuttering) Money? Kraghammer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Emon by way of Kraghammer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything else we want to do while we're here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we over this town? Over this city?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just need to pick up a little bit of ore on the way out so I can work on making some more ammunition on the way to Kraghammer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I like that idea. We could take the airship and you could craft some things. When we do go, I think I might have an idea for our carpet situation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your Wheel of Mending, perhaps?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, that didn't work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We tried that. It didn't work.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It kept it intact. But when we return to House Thunderbrand, I believe we have a few items that they want. The deal was when we procure certain items, we will be allowed to have certain information and certain-- we didn't explain what we were going to get. But we should return, get our gold, and definitely visit House Thunderbrand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. 'Cause they have magic things.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: They are strongly arcane. Perhaps they can enchant for what we have procured for them in that venture. And maybe that could be a good way of getting around getting our carpet re-enchanted without costing any coin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll prod that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can they make me unsee my sister's boobies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't see them! You were behind me, so shut up. What are you doing all the way over there, anyway?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I saw them. I saw them!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Scanlan? When you describe them to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will draw them in great detail.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wasn't there, either!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In great details of the internet. Just saying. I went there. It was already there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was caught up in a moment of passion! I'm sorry!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too late!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She would do anything for you, Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything for you and for the 600 gold that that I put on your fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it was for the money!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, I was right there. There was no other way around that situation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did what you had to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen. I would show any part of me for, like, two gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here's two gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, take a look at my third nipple!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On your body?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can be wherever I put it, really. It's magical.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's a piece of gum!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have no idea what's going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all together. That's what's going on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love this tavern.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What is closer to Kraghammer? Emon? Or where we're from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's halfway. I think Kraghammer is in between us and Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Actually, from where you guys are currently, across the Ozmit Sea is Emon, which is the port city in Tal'Dorei, and then Kraghammer is maybe two days' travel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we gotta stop into Emon first.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, that's fine. Are we all ready to go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By now, I'd say it's probably 1:00 in the afternoon, since that fight's happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Y'all, we're day drunk!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are we ready to go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're getting ore, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're celebrating Grog, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't Percy want ore?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not hard to get a little bit of ore. I'm just going to pick up some.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: After that, are we ready to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, maybe. There's two more things that I have unanswered questions for. First of all, you said we were going to stop on the way to get a new carpet or to get our carpet repaired?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We need to go to Kraghammer to collect our 30,000 gold waiting for us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 25,000, sorry. While we're there, House Thunderbrand. We've procured a few items, or at least one, while we were down in the Underdark. We should return there and talk to them and perhaps in exchange for gold, perhaps have them enchant the carpet to fly again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a smart idea. That's great. Before we leave though, does anyone have a nagging, tugging feeling about that cloaked human who praised your performance? Should we investigate that at all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He had a lovely beard!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that makes something. Could we at least find out who he was before we leave town?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, bartender!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes? You have a question?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. That bearded, hooded gentleman at the end of the fight, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thinks for a second. "Oh, you mean--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one that everyone was quiet for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The red and gold robes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Who? Who is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're certainly not from around here, are you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks around. "That was Earthbreaker Groon."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Earthbaker Groon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Earthbreaker Groon."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Earthbreaker Groon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a great name!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where does he hail from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's the Dawn Marshal of the entirety of these here Braving Grounds."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dawn Marshal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's the Dawn Marshal. He is the highest esteemed cleric of the church of Kord, the Trial "Forge itself, in the center of this city, this portion, this district. Well, he is the very top "of the entire hierarchy underneath Kord's strength and watch."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he nodded!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently, he was summoned to watch this fight and approved of your prowess in battle."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But that's an honor is what that is, and appreciate that yourself."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye, and I do. If I wanted to find this Earthbreaker Groom--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Groon. With an N."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would I find him in the middle of the Trial Forge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most likely."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So this guy's like the Pope of Kord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pope?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you for the information.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm foreign!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And foreign. Have a good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And has antlers on her head.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think we should all leave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like my antlers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like your antlers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's wrong with my antlers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing. It's just a very reasonable reason not to take you too seriously.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes? Yes, Tiberius, my good friend?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are you satisfied in your knowledge you've procured?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Too easy. Too easy!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Grog, I'm sure you would like to... go to a pub of sorts?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: We're in a pub!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're day drunk!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's how drunk we are!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a brilliant, if slightly inebriated, thought.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I walk out of the bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have an even better brilliant, yet slightly inebriated thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I think I saw Tiberius fall over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is Tiberius puking? Oh...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My thought is I can probably find some of the ore I need to procure at the same time that we find this Groon fellow, and at the very least, you can strike up a quick conversation with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like me to go with you, Grog, as your manager?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would actually like both the twins to go with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, would you like any young boys to accompany you? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can give them a medal!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I went back into the bar because I went to take a piss outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, where're we going?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What is going on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are recovering from your drink.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I've had plenty of water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're already been arrested today.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm fine! (slurred) Scanlan has been ordering me water for the whole time has been cleared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right! I have already been arrested today, but I did get better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys are going with Percy to procure materials for forging new ammunition?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happened to my dice? Okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: honestly, most of the smithing-based materials and/or workshops they required. The difficult part is finding black powder. It is not refined in this region. It's usually considered almost a byproduct of some of the mining and smelting, and it's very rare to find. Eventually, you find one smithy that gathers it. You're not entirely certain why. And after you give people a couple of examples of the smell of it and what to look for, people send you in this one direction. And you're sent to this one small hovel that is attached to the very base of the mountain that overlooks the entirety of the city, on the far northwestern edge of the Braving Grounds. You come to the door, and it's a very simple, slovenly-kept house. The wood itself is a little warped from the weather; it hasn't kept well, and there's a musty smell of mildew from the outside of the building. But you see a slight glow between the cracks. Apparently, there is some sort of interior light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charming. My name is Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski De Rolo III.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huzzah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I was sent here in terms to hopefully negotiate the purchase of some black powder? I heard--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door slams open at this point, mid-sentence, and you see from around the corner a very lithe, crooked-looking man. Quite elderly, but very spry for his size. You see his arms and legs are very lanky and almost spider-like in the way they move and shift as he peeks out. And you can see he has spectacles of two different sizes and thicknesses around each eye. His hair is frazzled and gray and white, and he goes, "Yes?! You said you need black powder? Yes, yes, come in, "come in!" And he runs back into the hovel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I gingerly enter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step inside, the scent hits you immediately, and you realize this place is probably filled with black powder. And the last thing anyone wants is to set off any sort of flame. This would be a very bad idea. And as you look around, your eyes adjust to the low-lit interior. You realize it's low-lit because there are two very, very faintly set magical torch sconces on each side that are very, very low light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very similar to the ones surrounding you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of like these, but even smaller! And you can see in the room, there is a small forge that's in disuse to the far end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would hope so!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pants heavily) "Speak up! Speak up, I haven't all day!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much for a barrel or a hogshead's worth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "However, for the hogshead--" You can see now the spittle dribbling down his chin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can! It's as if I can see the spittle myself!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about 400 even, and you can direct me to some ore, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ore? I do not work in ore."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought you might have a friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice, Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at that, he slipped right into Mercer there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's the other character.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love Percy. 25.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You seem so amiable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "400! 400 and I send you to Samson! Yes? You take?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My good sir, you have a deal!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (poof) The soot settles against you and the rest of you guys as you now find yourself partially covered in this slowly dissipating cloud of black powder. (coughs) You cough instinctively and push it away. "Yes. 400 gold. You pay?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I gingerly put the purse down in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points across the way with his shaking, crooked finger. "Samson! There! In the brick building! Tell him Victor sent you. He'll give you ore!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for all of your help. You've been so kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My pleasure. You want more powder, come back. Yes, yes?!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good! Goodbye!" And pushes you out, takes both of you by the arms and pushes you out, slams the door behind, and you are left standing there, half-covered in blackened soot and black powder, in the center of the thoroughfare, midday, stunned by the whole encounter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, come on, come the fuck on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing. Matt's crazy prospector character.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk over to Samson's place and become very excited at the prospect of a new accent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 4.3 from the Russian judge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (metal clanging) "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Samson?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The strange fellow down the road sent me to you. He said you might have some ore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Muscle-bound, a little thick around the waist, barrel-chested. A little bit of scruff on his chin, but nothing beyond not having time for upkeep and focused on his work. He steps up. "So "what did the old coot tell you, anyway?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He said you might have some raw ore for sale that I might purchase. You'll excuse me if I don't come in; I'm covered in explosive powder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, please. Stay there. For the love of Kord, stay on that doorstep. Do not step into my "abode, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please. All right. What ore are you interested in?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just some iron ore. Actually, I have a little invention which sends projectiles at great speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds fascinating. I have ore for sale. Raw ore-- would you like ingots? I prepare "ingots. They're a little more expensive, but they're proper and ready for any sort of use as "blacksmithing materials."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ingots would be preferable, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, how many are you looking for? Five, ten, 20?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What could you give me for approximately a thousand gold's worth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, I only have about 200 pounds of iron "ingots at the ready."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's say about a hundred pounds' worth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A hundred pounds of iron ingots. I could sell it to you. Let's set the price at about 400 "gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, haggle him down. I'm not there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But in the back of his head, he hears your voice. We all do, at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's say 350 gold, and I promise to always shower twice before entering your home for my next purchase.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pointless haggle. I love it. Best part of the show.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wish I were Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, underneath all that soot, I can see you "dress well, at the very least. A bit tattered around the edges... I'd like future business, so "350 and take the ingots, and please do shower next time."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course. You are a gentleman, and apparently a worthy smith, as well. I do bid you good day, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flattery is not required." He reaches over and settles into a large, triple-bagged sack of ingots. He gets partway through and goes, "Nah, "this is cart-worthy." He sets it up on a small cart and brings it over to you. And it's a small, wheeled wooden cart. It looks really rickety and probably about to collapse, but he does not charge you for it. It can be hand-carried if need be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good man, I will see you when my need arises again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to it. Remember: bathed!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very bathed. In fact, quite bathed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Seriously. Bathed. Please. All right, we're good. Thank you." And he closes the door. All right. You guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to see Earthbreaker...

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Earthbreaker Groon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make your way to the outskirts of the Trial Forge.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We know who he is. Do we need to pursue this guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to talk to him, because he likes Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we can stay and keep getting day-drunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you just go get arrested again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, that hurts, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to come back and join you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to do a daily roll for my pet because I'm going to try to teach a trick, and I rolled a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trying to teach it a trick?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. At the end of the-- does it just build up points today and then try...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What kind of trick are you teaching?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: To scout!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take some time, and with a small Draconian command, a phrase of your choice, you teach it that on that one phrase, it will go ahead and wander ahead for a bit and then come back and relinquish in very broken, very basic Draconic language into your connection with it. Very, very basic information on what it saw.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to throw a Lightning Bolt spell into my Ioun Stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you store that. Awesome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Little treat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. You guys make your way to the Trial Forge, the large temple to Kord itself. It's once again brilliant to behold. There are steps leading up to the front area: these giant reddish, almost rusted-over looking iron doors that block the front entrance. At the very top of it, you see looming over this entire district is a gargantuan statue of Kord himself. This giant, muscle-bound humanoid titan of a figure, that stands there: giant beard, muscle-bound torso, bracers against the arms, just one knee up. This very heroic pose and just looking over the rest of Vasselheim under his gaze. You see at the front of these iron doors, there are two more Bastions adorned in the same way as the ones that oversaw the battle at the Crucible. One shouts out, "Halt! Ye who approacheth the Trial Forge, what is your business here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we are here to pay homage to Earthbreaker Groon with the latest champion of the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of the city? The city claims no champion!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of the Crucible. You know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They glance at each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Earthbreaker is a fan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "I highly doubt that."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Tell him it's Grog's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check your facts, buddy. He likes the cut of his jib, believe you me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the other one gets up to his side and stands there, arms crossed, looking down upon you from three large stone steps up with this look of, "I'm looking forward to throwing these guys out." About five minutes pass and the next one comes back and whispers in his ear... "Very well. The "four of you may enter briefly. But this one's only invited to the center chamber. The rest of you "must keep a distance. A distance."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, like what? Ten feet? Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'll know." He steps aside and the doors (stone scraping) slide open. As you guys step into the interior, the smell that hits you immediately is that of sage and other burned herbs that are used ceremonially to cleanse a certain landscape of evil spirits, from a superstitious standpoint, but also to build an atmosphere of meditation and understanding. The one Bastion that left and came back and whispered in his ear comes up and leans into you guys and gives you a nod. He doesn't actually speak to you, but he gives you a hand gesture to follow. Leads you into the Trial Forge and you can see now, these halls are essentially one long hallway. It's an arch about 85 to 100 feet up. And the interior of it is built out of a very thick, sturdy reddish stone. You don't know if the actual stone itself is built from a substance of this color, or itself has been stained or colored to match the rest of the Kord reddish aesthetic. But as you step in, your footfalls clack against a black marble floor with what looks like gold streaks through it, almost like there are small veins of some sort of gold material that has been polished within the actual marble itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gives you a look and nudges you to proceed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need us with you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Yeah, you know I don't like talking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like someone to come and translate for him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he going on his own, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step forward, footfalls clacking against the material--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, we've been daytime drinking, and I hate to interrupt that, do you have a place here if I can't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think they-- This is a temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah this really not the kind of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puts his hand out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't like talking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh he has some sort of vow of silence. We should respect it and also make fun of it when he's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) I've got a flask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Grog steps out in the central chamber, you can hear his footfalls echoing throughout the site, and as you look up, you can see now the light source from above, there is what looks like a stained-glass domed roof to the top of the central chamber. There is a dark spot in the center, where you can see the shadow from the early afternoon sun is being blocked from the giant statue of Kord that remains at the top of this temple, who is currently, essentially, now looking at the structure, straddling the top of this giant domed stained glass roof, and so underneath this statue is where the top of this structure is, and through it, these beams of light are coming down, multicolored and cascading onto this central chamber. Sitting in the center, you see, cross-legged, arms to the side, eyes closed, there sits Earthbreaker Groon, the Dawn Marshal himself. Quiet, as you approach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eyes closed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eyes closed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I step forward and say: (coughs) Sorry to disturb, I'm looking for Earthbreaker Groon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're staring straight at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have found the Earthbreaker. What do you ask of me?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I keep the little bit of pee that's about to fall out from falling out, and I say: I happened to see you amongst the crowd at my recent tussle. It seemed that everyone there seemed to know who you were. I wanted to at least introduce myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are Grog the Victorious."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right! (coughs) That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Once called Philip. Known as one of Vox Machina, the travelling band from Emon. Slayer of "demons that once usurped Uriel himself. I know of your travels. I know of your deeds. What else do "you ask of the Earthbreaker?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't really ask. I only mean to say that Vox Machina is at your disposal, if you would ever need someone outside of the amazing Braving Grounds, Vasselheim. We're really amazing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We know where they're at, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We don't know where they're at?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you would just keep us in mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dark times are ahead. I can see the veils "twisting. Many, many evil minds come to rend the peace apart. There will be a day I call for you, "Grog the Victorious. Stay alive."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean to. Thank you. It has been an honor being in your presence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now go." He turns around and sits back into his meditate position and closes his eyes and disappears back into the same place where you originally saw him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I turn around and I go: Guys, his fucking eyes are glowing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) We're not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) You've got to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You kept it together great!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks. Did you hear all of that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I couldn't hear much, but it was great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I almost had an aneurysm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He sounded very serious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah we should go. He's cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think I should shit somewhere--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Just go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, we'll just go, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sans shit. And we're out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Better be safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Better be safe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a little one.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No? Okay, we'll just go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we make our way out of the golden-floored, glowing-eyed guy's house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You carrying to your side, strapped, a dried hogshead filled with black powder and a cart of about 100 pounds of iron ingots.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! You want me to hold onto all that for you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, if you could just help load it onto the ship, that would be lovely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going on the airship?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If we could fit it in the Bag of Holding, it would be much better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. Certainly, if we can put it in the Bag of Holding, that would be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a pig's head?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is literally a pig's head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's complicated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's find Captain Damon and get back on the ship.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I start casting Circle of Teleportation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this discussion, you look over and you can see the airship, which is a not too hard to see from this distance, is currently being outfitted, actually being finalized, being outfitted with brand new ballistae. Remember those giant dragon-headed ballistae you saw settled on the walls on the outskirts of Vasselheim? Those have now been affixed to the airship, as the previous air encounter it had, they didn't seem to quite cut through the defenses. You guys notice this just in time, as you see a flash of light and you look over your shoulder, and Tiberius has finished drawing what looks to be a large sigil-- I fixed my pronunciation in that, thank you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like "siggle."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I grew up with "siggle," and nevertheless-- I know. Sigil--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Since I came in at the halfway mark, I really wanted to go to an ink specialist here in Vasselheim before we left, so can we retcon and go backwards and say that I got the elven sounds for "vuh" and "mm" put right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tattooed on his fucking wrist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Elven. And then over here, I don't remember much of the mathematics, that my teachers in our homeland--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are you saying that someone out there in the world should do the elven symbol for VM and we should all get literally tattooed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's ridiculous. But over here, I have a mathematical shape. I don't know if you know arithmetic, but I learned arithmetic when I was studying. I learned knife-work, I learned elven poetry, and I learned arithmetic and I had a knack for it. She didn't, but I did. And I would like to get a-- it was called an icosahedron-- right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are we all doing that together?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In real life?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is real life. But to start--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go together. Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just me, the symbol for "vuh" and "mm" in Elven right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, as you've had this done over the past few days as you were awaiting the return of the other team who went off against a white dragon, apparently, you've had the time to do so, you just haven't quite revealed it to the rest of your allies yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. But you guys look over your shoulder, and as you're talking about taking an airship, Tiberius has crafted a runic circle into the ground that itself is beginning to pulse with arcane energy, a familiar "siggle," one that you think actually--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Sigil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sigil. No, I keep fucking it up. I just happily fixed it, and then you caught me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pronounced Coke and a cola.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. The arcane

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Down by the beach, so that we have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Down over by the bad lands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, you are on the cusp of completing your ritual.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I choose Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The sigil flashes with arcane energy and opens up. You see a small doorway that's sparkling across the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's just making the sigil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can just pop over to Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the sigil shimmering as the energy is beginning to fade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the airship? What about Captain Damon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The airship was only going to take us to Emon, anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk right through it and say, Tiberius, where are we going?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Emon. I go through, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain Damon--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll hold it for a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thinking, Tiberius!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I just jump in, woohoo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all leap through the sigil--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I keep jumping into things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like jumping into things. I like leap of faiths. They're exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys find yourself once again in a small, white room. Familiar; the place that was your immediate sigh of relief when you returned from the Underdark.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, it feels good to be home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push through the doorway, returning once again to the 80-foot circular chamber of white stone, where a vibrant crystal chandelier hangs from the ceiling. There are five other doors around the room, and you are currently in the center of the Traverse Junction within the Alabaster Lyceum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, we just did this. It wasn't too long ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's okay, we popped out. Is the same guy there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. Gatekeeper Xanthus is there waiting for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long have we been gone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on, Tiberius wants to say something.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: To explain the travel schematic, it would take us a few days to come back on the airship to this particular area if want to go back to Kraghammer. It would be much more efficient if we teleport, as we have, and take a transport to Kraghammer, which is only north of here, as well, which will only probably take a day, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, did we leave Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is with us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Airship. From here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. It is nearly a week to travel from Emon to Vasselheim in the airship, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: To Kraghammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, to Kraghammer from here, it's about a three-day travel on horseback.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right. The airship, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no airship to Kraghammer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but it would have dropped us off in Emon anyway.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So we just shaved off five days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job, Tiberius.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop on out and I say, hello again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes? Oh, you. You've returned."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, this time, I would like you to fill out the proper paperwork."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This time, of course, you already know ahead of time that we are dear friends of Uriel, and we do not need to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is not true. I had my ass chewed out by Headmaster Thurmond the last time you came "through and told me that. So--" and he fumbles underneath his desk-- (boof) slams down what looks to be a cluster of about 20 to 25 papers. "I require you to fill these out so I do not lose my "job here in the Lyceum."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, Vax pulls it over and starts filling it out and says, all right, but you know, we're kind of a big deal here--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was saying, Percy is so good at paperwork.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can split the load.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we had a lawyer for this. I thought we had Burt Reynolds, esquire.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We're doing the paperwork.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got it. But Uriel's not going to be pleased.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to be super pissed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But don't worry, I'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to it. Great."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, there you are, and here's my--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a bathroom around here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, Scanlan, hold it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Down the hall to the left."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I might make it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax fills out the entire thing, except for the final signature, and says, Scanlan, could you put the final signature on this?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Notarize it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius is helping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Buttoning up my fly. Final signature? I'll just sign my name.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That works, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you kindly. You are free to go."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it's been a pleasure."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A real pleasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very much so, thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you so much."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, here we go. We'll go out this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what I think? I think you guys hate each other, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Emon is so beautiful--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, I shat in the hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time of day is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather it's probably around 2:00 or 3:00 in the afternoon. No time has passed, since the travel was instantaneous, thanks to teleportation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are so good, you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we take a day or two to recuperate and then make our way to Kraghammer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are officially drunk in two different cities!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not drunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is our next destination Kraghammer?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. Collect our money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's take a night and then go set off in the morning.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What time is it right now, in the day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 4PM.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Could we ride, maybe? Drunk riding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well... (whining) We haven't been home in so long.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We can go to the keep and say hi to everyone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to water the garden. It's probably half dead.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, we have servants that do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the keep!

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: To the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way through the Cloudtop District to the southern edge of Emon, to the lower slums outside of the city, along the southern wall to Greyskull Keep. The visual is welcoming. It looks standing, clean, and in the distance you can see a figure walking across the top of the wall, keeping watch. As you get closer, you can see it is the image of Cordell, the half-orc individual that you guys hired along with Shayne. As you approach the front gate, you see what looks like a tent: a large, thick burlap or linen, brown tent is set up right outside of you guys'--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That wasn't there before--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? What is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cordell. Cordell! What is this tent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has her crossbow at the ready. She goes, "Oh! "Finally, you've arrived. I'm so glad you could make it. Yes, this has been here for about two "weeks now."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is someone inside of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you hear sudden rustling from inside of the tent and a face pops out, briefly. You can see what looks like humanoid features, and suddenly darts back inside. And you hear more rustling. It sounds like pots and metals clinking around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I immediately go over there and throw open the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Scanlan. Scanlan I've heard your tales across the land. Your womanizing does not reach ears too far "from the city."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm... Men, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you, the twins. Vax'ildan and Vex'ahlia. Oh, the many bodies you've lain at your "feet of the evil that crossed your path. And the mighty, muscled Grog. Oh, I am beside myself. I've "been waiting for this--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog the Victorious. Get it right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Victorious. Yes, of course!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you are, young man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am Kynan Leore, son of Harold the butcher, and I wish to join you in your travels."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, darling! You're so brave and strong.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, you're welcome to do so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! No, not at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really? It would be my honor. It really, truly would be."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vox Machina has been together for many years, and we've forged our bonds of friendship--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can forge my way. I can prove myself."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What is your skill, sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. My father, Harold the butcher, is well known throughout these lands."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Butchering, I believe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a good butcher. Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, he is an actual butcher in the upper slums. But! I have been training day and night for "months until I was ready to fight alongside you all and I humbly offer my sword "as part of Vox Machina."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ah, your sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I am a skilled swordsman!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He was a friend of--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. What was his name? Linen Fyken?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Leonard Fyke. He was once--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Leonard Fyke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Leonard Fyke, yes."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he's talking, I motion to open the gates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a shift as Shayne and Cordell begin to pull the top of the gates, the chains clenching. (metal creaking)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he talking to Vex? Are they talking together?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm using insight on him as he's talking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll insight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How close are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about four feet across.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four feet apart? I flip a dagger in my hand and I go (impact noise) to the back of his head, is what I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just to knock him out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I did it. It's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't worry. I'm using the flat end. Oh, good. That's a 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus a high number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you rolled a 17?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll sneak attack damage. It's a critical because he hasn't acted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but it's the back end of the dagger, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Go ahead and roll sneak attack times two.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I go inside the keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're touching my dice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The boy needs a lesson. This is not a life for a child. Okay, that's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Jesus. It's like a million.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Times two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 28 on the sneak attack damage only.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that times two? Or is it 28 times two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, times two. So that's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dead!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he's not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You cleaved his head off with the blunt end of the knife.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he's a level one, you killed him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 56. Just the sneak attack damage alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then add the d4 and the modifier for the dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So a total of 66 damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 66 damage, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm trained. I'm--" (impact noise). And he goes straight down into a pile.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With my bonus action, I pull out one of my remaining healing potions, right? And I shove it in his mouth like this, and it'll go glug-glug-glug down him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That happened so fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually he's like, (panting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, darling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take him by the lapels. Things move very fast with us. I don't think you understand what you're asking for. If you think you can handle that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, Vax'ildan." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is why he's single.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard of your work for quite some time. Show me your ways."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's dangerous. You could die any given day. So could I, so could she, so could him. Maybe not him, but the rest of us, sure. Are you really interested in this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tough love. That's called tough love. It's not bad. That's a ten plus-- can somebody pass me that shit over there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at you for a second. His brow comes together, and you can see there's a quiver to his bottom lip. He goes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, wait. There. There's his heart breaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I thought you were heroes. I waited two weeks to meet you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How could you do that to him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me your name again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kynan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It doesn't matter. It doesn't matter at all. You're right." And he puts his hand up and pushes you away. He pulls out of your hands and takes a few steps away and looks over his shoulder. You can see now, there's tears welling up in his eyes. He goes, "I just wanted to be a hero."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan! Kynan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Train him up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Send him on a mission.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come back when you're ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, send him on a mission.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come back when you're ready. Come back again. Train yourself, and I, personally, will be your mentor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you'd better roll good because I'm going to be so mad at you if you hurt him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's my persuasion? Oh, you passed it down. All right. I make a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks back at you, and the tears--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 20 on that one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sniffs) "You mean that?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do. You will be my right-hand man. I promise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over at the rest of you. Looks at Percy. Looks at Keyleth. Tiberius isn't there; Tiberius has already walked into the keep. Looks at Scanlan. Looks at Vex'ahlia. Looks at Grog. He grasps the sword that's currently sheathed at his side. "I will. I'll make you proud. I will be Vox "Machina with you. I swear it. I swear it!" He runs back to his tent, and you see him start gathering up his things, and he begins tearing it down, and you can see the tears are still coming, but he's steeled his expression.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk over to him. These people can't hear this. I kneel down next to him, and I put my hand on his shoulder and say, I was once like you and didn't know what I wanted or where I was going. I just want you to be ready. We've got some shit to do. When we come back, we'll start over. You're starting from ground zero. Starting from the basement, you'll work your way up. And I promise, I will be ready for you no matter what Mercer throws at me. I promise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mercer's our god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't question it. And I take him by the hair. Don't question it. Come back. Right on his forehead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see he's partially torn between wanting to look hard and ready to do this, and also still blown away by the fact that he's even encountered you guys after all this time. He takes the rest of his stuff and holds it in one arm and darts off down the path towards the river, hops over it, and then makes his way towards the rest of Emon and vanishes into the distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, you might have just sent him to his death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did you have to knock him out?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To go home and train?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could have trained him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We almost died ourselves in that temple, in that pyramid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just put expectations in his head!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are they inside yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're walking inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we should have made him a full-fledged member today, right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's not what I'm saying at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make him a butler? He doesn't want to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Serious-faced.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I look right at Vax. Why did you do that to that young man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He wasn't ready!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Stop it. It was aggressive beyond necessity. We should have trialed the boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was his trial.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was not a trial!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll see, if he comes back.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You are far more powerful, Vax. You know that. This boy was a fan, at best. We could have put him to work, or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think he would have been happy with work? I'm not even happy that he told him to go off and continue training. I think telling him to go off and continue training is a bad idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He now knows the facts. He knows his skill level. He knows where he stands. He will either go back to being a fishmonger--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Son of a butcher.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Son of a butcher, well. Everyone has their own personal path. Or he will come back to me, and if he comes back to me, I will train him. If not, it wasn't meant to be.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And if he comes for your head?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He won't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he won't?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll deal with that, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you never see The Incredibles? (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You and Grog I respect and fear the most out of all of us. You are cunning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I, chopped liver?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I could crush you in one blow, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's leave it at that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vex, I fear you and am slightly attracted to you, as well. Grog and Vax, you are the strongest and most noble and cunning--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You live because I let you live. Just needed to say that out loud.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you hear a voice ring out from across the courtyard of the keep. "Ah! You've "all returned!" And you see across the way, Laina, your joyful housekeeper, comes rushing out, arms open to greet you all. You can see there's a little bit of dirt on the front of her apron, like she's been cutting the hedges or doing some sort of garden work. She rushes out and hugs you. "It's "been so long. It's been far too long. It's so good to see all of you."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I see her, I turn to greet, but I want to give Vax a little pinch on the butt. A little friendly pinch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Sorry, that reminds me. Hold on." And she pulls out a little piece of paper. You recognize it: it's used in various arcane messaging. She pulls out a small quill and dabbles it and starts writing a quick message on it. Closes the lid (fire burst noise). It disappears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry. I was given that, just in case you all returned--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who gave you that? What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Seeker Asum Emring of the council. The ranger. He said as soon as you all returned, I'm "supposed to let him know. He had very important business with you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe for the future, don't do that until we tell you it's okay to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeker Emring, you said? Of the council of Tal'Dorei?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's an ally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's fine. It's just, maybe we wanted to take a little nap or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, ask us first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was given implicit instructions by him."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's all right, we forgive you. I give her a hug. Sorry, I'm very scaly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Ah, it's good to see you, too, Lord Tiberius Stormwind."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you instruct the security guard-- we can take care of it. We should instruct the security guards: if there's a tent outside the keep, they should just burn it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that nice boy! I brought him biscuits every morning. He was so sweet, that one."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You brought him biscuits? Oh, she fed the stray. That's adorable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do me a favor. Roll up his tent, keep it inside. If he comes back to ask for it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He already rolled up his tent when he took off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did he leave anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was a couple of small pots and pans and things that he left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If he comes back, let him in. If I'm not here, let him use my room for as long as he likes, and I'll pay for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, it'll be done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feeling guilty that you knocked him out, brother?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I feel perfectly justified.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, you shouldn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we rest before we go see this ranger?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You guys make your way into the keep. Laina immediately rushes off to the kitchen and begins preparing a welcome back meal for all of you. You can smell, after the next ten to 15 minutes pass by, that scent of freshly-cooked meats and baking bread begins to fill the air around Greyskull Keep. The halls are kept nice and warm. It's very clean, and it's a very welcome sight to be back home. You take time to rest and exhale and go over the sequence, and as you walk by, you see across the right from the main foyer, you can see a little bit of the light echoing through from the temple of Sarenrae, the stained glass, itself, and for a moment you all take a sad memory of Pike, whereever she is, hopefully to return to you very soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just not home without her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing, Scanlan, how do you look through your poo? Can you look through it anywhere, or is it perhaps from the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could concentrate very hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just concentrate for a moment and see what she's doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would we be able to see, as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'd have to describe to you what I see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell us what you see. Unless she's naked, in which case, stop looking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course, I would definitely stop looking if I saw her naked in front of my poo. Definitely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you...?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'm going to try to scry through my poo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sit down and close your eyes and begin to concentrate, and as you begin to focus your energy, the sense of the arcane mind itself has gathered between the center of the head and the center of the chest. You begin to join these in the center, and your consciousness begins to glide downward towards your bowels. Eventually, you find a point of connection and you feel your vision transcending this single point on the prime material plane. You are brought through the small channel across the astral sea to connect, and suddenly your vision takes place. What looks like a cluster of dirt to one side and a darkened chamber that is lit by a series of torches. Before you, you see, still and slightly muddled, the Temple of Sarenrae as partially uncovered. You can see the large stone archway that is the front of the partially collapsed temple. You can see now there is stone being brought down the wooden staircase, and it is being used to slowly build up and reconstruct what was once a beautiful and very well-revered structure. You can see in the distance a small, white-haired gnome figure that is currently acting as foreman for this whole construction process and is giving orders and shouts to the other individuals here. Glancing about, you see her step over, and one person trips and drops a stone, and she walks up to them and takes them by the shoulder and lifts them back up and gives them a little hug, and then picks up the stone and carries it with them over to where it belongs on the side of one of the walls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She should fire that person, but okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few more moments pass and you gather that this is a slow-moving, but a consistent moving, renovation of the temple of Sarenrae, based on the limited number of people that she has at her disposal to help with the process. But it seems to be going well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She was definitely naked.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she was supervising her crew in a fair, but firm way. She was just being Pike: driven, radiant, beautiful, and empowered by the spirit of Sarenrae. She's everything that we think of her and more. She's beautiful and charming. Let's just let it be known that I could kill Tiberius if I wanted to. Just going to say that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's fine. Yes, you can, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I mean, that's beside the point. Pike was glorious and wonderful and confident, and I miss her so much. I hope from time to time I can look in on her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anytime you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look through your shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's really any bodily fluid, I believe. I could piss. I could barf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Any time ever?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this real? Is it a real thing? Is it real? He can do this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a gradual fade to the effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm raising my flask, and I say: To Pike.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: To Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The best in all of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She really was, and is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our own little inspirational poster, inside each and every one of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's not little, but yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all drink, a familiar voice echoes from across the hallway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see Erwen Dastell, your elderly halfling manservant, is there standing in his attire, smiling, happy to see you all. "Laina would like you all to know that your meal is "ready. This way, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Erwen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leads you to the dining hall. The food is already prepared, and you sit down to eat. The meal is very welcome; it's the best food you've had in a while. Comparable to Southern comfort food. There's gravy, biscuits-- it's beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fried chicken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) It's delightful. A little ways into the meal, you can see Cordell steps into the room and glances in for a second. "I am sorry to interrupt, but we have a visitor."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a councilor from Tal'Dorei?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is. The halfling."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Invite him in for dinner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he want some fried chicken?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could ask."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell him if he's okay with us being a little tipsy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I figured we just kept going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment goes by, and you see Seeker Asum Emring arrives at the doorway. He's wearing dark, looks like studded leather armor, a very deep green cloak about his shoulders. Even at the council meetings, he's dressed for utility. He seems to be that individual who has his eye in many places in the room at once; he's a ranger by trade, and paranoid by nature. His head is shaved bald, and he has tattoos across one side of his halfling face. As he walks in, he gives a swift bow and says to everyone, "Greetings. I'm sorry to interrupt your meal. I was notified that you have "arrived, and I have business I would like to discuss, if you have a moment."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans) Is it bad news? We're not in the mood for bad news.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm all right. It's not bad news, it's just something I wanted to run by the rest of you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please feel free to speak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He steps and finds a chair at one of the nearby tables, clustered towards the center, where you guys have pushed your dining tables together. "Now, while you were gone, a venture has "been put into motion. In celebration of the agreed-upon construction of a grand bridge across "the Shearing Channel to the eastern continent of Wynandia, a dinner is being held here within a "week. This venture is helmed by one Lord and Lady Briarwood of Whitestone, as the bridge would be "set at the edge of the Alabaster Sierras. They are probably en route as we speak. The bridge shall "open trade routes with the kingdom of Wildmount across the way. I'm here because few things escape "my eye. Percival, when last we were company, you had shifted so very uncomfortably at the mention "of these two. May I ask why?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Had I? I hadn't noticed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I did."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have had dealings with them before. I find them... untrustworthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have my reservations, as well. My network has been watching their acquisition of Whitestone "since the de Rolo family fell to disease, and there are far more questions than answers. I've "sent operatives to inquire, but each has sent me a letter of resignation instead of choosing to stay "within Whitestone under my employ. Now, our sovereign requested that I extend an invitation to this "coming dinner-- per your request to him, Percy-- to you, Vox Machina. I am here to ask if you will "attend, and if so, if I can trust you to keep an eye while I do my work."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What say you, Percy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's Percy's call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Yes, we will attend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very good. I will contact you in the next few days and shall discuss further. Until then, "enjoy the rest of your meal, and thank you." He sits up from his seat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're having bread pudding for dessert.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm good, thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, when did you say this dinner was taking place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In about a week, they should be arriving."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excuse me. I have a bit of work to do downstairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we go to Kraghammer in that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven days in a week or in a week, like five days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are expected to arrive in the next five to seven days. The dinner is set for seven to "eight days from now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for your information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. We shall discuss further."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already gone.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, what is the attire for the event?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As formal as one may muster. If you do not have suitable attire, it will be provided, but "please do notify the council."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could lend you one of my jackets.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'd like to see what they propose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't really do formal, so?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, Grog. We have a wonderful tailor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fancy clothes in the bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In your Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got like two left, and they wouldn't fit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have business to attend to. Have a good night."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll be there. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course." And with that, he turns around and leaves. He's one of those individuals where as he walks away, and this catches your eye in particular, for a moment you have to admire the fact that he takes naught but two steps and for a second, you swear he was walking, he had about 15 feet to the door, and he's just gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but I want to talk to Percy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! Percy just ran off to the basement, to his workshop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up directly from this moment next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, I feel like we need to have a conversation with Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that needs to happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (screams) (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, Percy, do you want to strike off in a random direction and just go and go and go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, that money that we're owed. Why don't we do that? I think we have time for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we could send an errand-boy to get it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're back, guys. We're back! [end of captions]
